SELECT COUNT(*) , M.nickname AS extra__writer FROM mercenaryArticle AS A INNER JOIN `member` AS M ON A.memberId = M.id WHERE 1
AND A.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND A.`body` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')

SELECT A.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer, T.teamName AS teamName, T.teamRank AS teamRank, T.area AS area FROM mercenaryArticle AS A INNER JOIN `member` AS M ON A.memberId = M.id LEFT JOIN `team` AS T ON A.teamId = T.id WHERE A.id = #{id}

SELECT A.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer, IFNULL(COUNT(R.id), 0) AS extra__repliesCount, T.teamName AS teamName, T.teamRank AS teamRank, T.area AS area FROM mercenaryArticle AS A INNER JOIN `member` AS M ON A.memberId = M.id LEFT JOIN `reply` AS R ON A.id = R.relId LEFT JOIN `team` AS T ON A.teamId = T.id WHERE 1
AND A.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND A.`body` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND M.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND ( A.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR A.`body` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') )
AND T.area = #{area}
GROUP BY A.id ORDER BY A.id DESC
LIMIT #{limitFrom}, #{limitTake}
